attributes.action: Stop Barclaycard and Capital One making persistent and intimitating calls to customers who have defaulted on their monthly payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have defaulted on one months payment to barlclaycard and capital one and have contacted both parties to let them know that this is due to cash flow problems and have assured them that duly I shall be making a payment to rectify the situation and in the case of barclaycard resume my payments as I have done for the last 15 years. Today 4/7/09 I have received as of 15:00hrs five calls from them demanding a payment there and then. I consider this intimidating if not strictly legal
